question: You have decided to leave your current job due to some reason.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter, tell him about the decision and mention the reason for it describe what you have learnt in the job request for a recommendation letter and experience letter
text: I regretfully inform you that I am not in a position to continue my current role in this organization
as I have got an excellent job offer in my domain of interest from another company. I hope my notice period would be calculated from the time you have acknowledged this information.

It was not an easy decision for me to make. I had an amazing period interacting with my peers and learning the latest technical skills from time to time. Apart from this, your organization help me to grow and evolve into the efficient manager that I am today and I thank you abundantly for providing me with an opportunity to be a part of the prestigious company that has enabled me to master time management, team management and leadership skills. Thank you once again for being my guide and well-wisher throughout these years.

It would be kind of you to issue my experience letter stating my expertise in the management area, and my roles and responsibilities too. Additionally, I request you to provide a recommendation letter stating my skills and achievements.  I would really appreciate it if I could receive these letters at your earliest convenience. I am looking forward to hear from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The verb hear is usually in the gerund form when following the word looking forward to. Consider replacing it with the -ing form.
